program atcoder_abc129_e
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: n
    integer, allocatable :: dp(:,:)
    integer :: i_f, i_prev
    character(len=1) :: c
    integer :: temp0, temp1
    integer :: first_dp0, first_dp1
    integer :: delta_dp0, delta_dp1
    integer :: new_dp0, new_dp1
    integer :: MOD = M  ! convenient

    ! Read input
    read(*, '(A)') s
    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Allocate DP table (0..n rows, 0..1 columns)
    allocate(dp(0:n, 0:1))
    dp = 0
    dp(0,0) = 1

    ! Iterate over each character in the string
    do i_f = 1, n
        c = s(i_f:i_f)
        i_prev = i_f -1

        temp0 = dp(i_prev, 0)
        temp1 = dp(i_prev, 1)

        ! First stage
        if (c == '0') then
            first_dp0 = temp0
            first_dp1 = temp1
        else
            first_dp0 = 0
            first_dp1 = mod(temp0 + temp1, M)
        end if

        ! second stage
        if (c == '0') then
            ! compute delta for first_dp1
            delta_dp1 = mod(2 * temp1, M)
            new_dp0 = first_dp0
            new_dp1 = mod( first_dp1 + delta_dp1, M )
        else
            delta_dp0 = mod( 2 * temp0, M )
            delta_dp1 = mod( 2 * temp1, M )
            new_dp0 = mod( first_dp0 + delta_dp0, M )
            new_dp1 = mod( first_dp1 + delta_dp1, M )
        end if

        ! Assign to dp(i_f)
        dp(i_f, 0) = new_dp0
        dp(i_f, 1) = new_dp1
    end do

    ! Compute result
    print *, mod( dp(n, 0) + dp(n, 1), M )

end program atcoder_abc129_e

program atcoder_abc129_e
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: M = 1000000007
    character(len=100000) :: s
    integer :: n
    integer, allocatable :: dp(:,:)
    integer :: i_f, i_prev
    character(len=1) :: c
    integer :: temp0, temp1
    integer :: first_dp0, first_dp1
    integer :: delta_dp0, delta_dp1
    integer :: new_dp0, new_dp1
    integer :: MOD

    ! Read input
    read(*, '(A)') s
    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Allocate DP table (0..n rows, 0..1 columns)
    allocate(dp(0:n, 0:1))
    dp = 0
    dp(0,0) = 1

    ! Iterate over each character in the string
    do i_f = 1, n
        c = s(i_f:i_f)
        i_prev = i_f -1

        temp0 = dp(i_prev, 0)
        temp1 = dp(i_prev, 1)

        ! First stage
        if (c == '0') then
            first_dp0 = temp0
            first_dp1 = temp1
        else
            first_dp0 = 0
            first_dp1 = modulo(temp0 + temp1, M)  ! herein, modulo here
        end if

        ! Second stage

            delta_dp1 = modulo(2 * temp1, M )
            new_dp0 = first_dp0

            delta_dp1 = modulo(2*temp1, M )
            new_dp0 = modulo( first_dp0 + delta_dp0, M )
            new_dp1 = modulo( first_dp1 + delta_dp1, M )
        end if

        ! Assign to dp(i_f)
        dp(i_f, 0) = new_dp0
        dp(i_f, 1) = new_dp1

    ! Compute result and print
